name: Dive to the Abyssal Void
description:
In this 3D platform-adventure to uncover the secrets of the mysterious and enigmatic hole that has appeared on the planet where the character we manage lives, our goal is to go deeper into the mysterious hole as an investigator and solve the mystery waiting to be uncovered by overcoming all kind of obstacles!

Enjoy endless gameplay as you try to better your previous score with each attempt!
Witness a non-stop adventure where you can enjoy the wonderful colorful and eye-catching atmosphere and graphics!
Do your best in this 3D platform game where you overcome various obstacles, both moving and non-moving, and solve the mystery waiting to be unraveled!
